CCDD

Class CcddScriptHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • CCDD.CcddScriptHandler

  • public class CcddScriptHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    CFS Command and Data Dictionary script handler class. This class handles execution of the data output scripts

      • getAssociationsTable

        protected CcddJTableHandler getAssociationsTable()
        Get a reference to the script associations table
        Returns:
        Reference to the script associations table

      • getAssociationsPanel

        protected javax.swing.JPanel getAssociationsPanel(java.lang.String title,
                                                  boolean allowSelectDisabled,
                                                  java.awt.Component parent)
        Create the panel containing the script associations table
        Parameters:
        title - text to display above the script associations table; null or blank if no text is to be displayed
        allowSelectDisabled - true if disabled associations can be selected; false if not. In the script manager disabled associations are selectable so that these can be deleted if desired. Scripts that are selected and disabled are ignored when executing scripts
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        Reference to the JPanel containing the script associations table

      • isAssociationAvailable

        private boolean isAssociationAvailable(int row)
        Check if the script association on the specified row in the associations table is available. An association is unavailable if the script or tables is not present
        Parameters:
        row - table row (model coordinates)
        Returns:
        true if the script association on the specified row is available

      • getAssociationTablePaths

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAssociationTablePaths(java.lang.String associationMembers,
                                                                    CcddGroupHandler groupHandler,
                                                                    boolean isForExport,
                                                                    java.awt.Component parent)
        Get the list of a script association's member table paths. If a group is referenced then its member tables are included. This method is also used to parse a string of table names when exporting via the command line export command
        Parameters:
        associationMembers - association members as a single string (as stored in the database)
        groupHandler - group handler reference
        isForExport - true when using this method to build the list of tables to export via the command line export command. This flag should be set to false when using this method for obtaining the tables for script associations
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        List containing the tables (path+name) from the association member string

      • getExtensions

        protected javax.swing.filechooser.FileNameExtensionFilter[] getExtensions()
        Get an array of all script file extensions supported by the available script engines
        Returns:
        Array of all script file extensions supported by the available script engines

      • getEngineInformation

        protected java.lang.String getEngineInformation()
        Get the string containing the available script engines and version numbers
        Returns:
        String containing the available script engine names and version numbers appropriate for display in the Help | About dialog; returns "none" if no scripting languages are installed

      • getEnvironmentVariableMap

        private boolean getEnvironmentVariableMap(java.awt.Component parent)
        Update the environment variable map with any variables specified by the user. Update the association availability based on if the script exists, using the current environment variables to expand its path
        Parameters:
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        true if the each key has a corresponding value; false if a value is missing

      • getMatchingAssociation

        protected static int getMatchingAssociation(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> associations,
                                            java.lang.String scriptName,
                                            java.lang.String[] tables,
                                            int ignoreRow)
        Get the index from the supplied script association list for the association with the same script file name and members
        Parameters:
        associations - list of script associations to which to compare
        scriptName - script file path + name
        tables - array of tables referenced by the script association
        ignoreRow - row to ignore when checking for an identical, existing association (as is possible when replacing an association, if no changes are made); -1 to prevent a duplicate association (as when adding an association)
        Returns:
        The index number in the supplied list where the matching association occurs; -1 if no match is found

      • executeScriptAssociations

        protected void executeScriptAssociations(CcddTableTreeHandler tableTree,
                                         CcddFrameHandler dialog)
        Execute one or more scripts based on the script associations in the script associations list
        Parameters:
        tableTree - CcddTableTreeHandler reference describing the table tree
        dialog - reference to the script dialog (manager or executive) calling this method

      • getDataAndExecuteScriptInBackground

        protected void getDataAndExecuteScriptInBackground(CcddTableTreeHandler tree,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> associations,
                                                   java.awt.Component dialog)
        Get the table information array from the table data used by the script script association(s), then execute the script(s). This command is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The script execution command, however, is disabled until the this command completes execution
        Parameters:
        tree - table tree of the table instances (parent tables with their child tables); null if the tree should be loaded
        associations - list of script association to execute
        dialog - reference to the entity calling this method: the script manager or executive dialog, or to the main window (if invoked from the command line)

      • getDataAndExecuteScript

        protected boolean[] getDataAndExecuteScript(CcddTableTreeHandler tree,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> associations,
                                            java.awt.Component parent)
        Get the table information array from the table data used by the script script association(s), then execute the script(s)
        Parameters:
        tree - table tree of the table instances (parent tables with their child tables); null if the tree should be loaded
        associations - list of script associations to execute
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog; null if none (e.g., if called via the command line)
        Returns:
        Array containing flags that indicate, for each association, if the association did not complete successfully

      • convertAssociationMembersFormat

        protected static java.lang.String convertAssociationMembersFormat(java.lang.String assnMembers,
                                                                  boolean toInternal)
        Convert the supplied string containing the association members from the internal table to the viewable format, or vice versa, depending on the input flag
        Parameters:
        assnMembers - tables and/or groups associated with the script, in either the internal or viewable format
        toInternal - true to convert the member string to the internal format; false to convert to the viewable format
        Returns:
        Supplied string containing the association members converted from the internal table to the viewable format, or vice versa

      • logScriptCompletionStatus

        protected void logScriptCompletionStatus(java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> associations,
                                         boolean[] isBad)
        Log the result of the script association execution(s)
        Parameters:
        associations - list of script association executed
        isBad - Array containing flags that indicate, for each association, if the association did not complete successfully

      • logScriptError

        private void logScriptError(java.lang.String scriptFileName,
                            java.lang.String members,
                            java.lang.String cause,
                            java.awt.Component parent)
        Log a script execution error
        Parameters:
        scriptFileName - script file name
        members - tables and/or groups associated with the script, in the internal format
        cause - cause of the execution error
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

      • getScriptEngine

        protected javax.script.ScriptEngine getScriptEngine(java.lang.String scriptFileName,
                                                    CcddClassesDataTable.TableInformation[] tableInformation,
                                                    CcddLinkHandler linkHandler,
                                                    CcddGroupHandler groupHandler,
                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> groupNames,
                                                    java.awt.Component parent)
                                             throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Create a script engine for the supplied script file name and table information. Non-static and static script data access handlers are bound to the engine so that the public access methods can be utilized
        Parameters:
        scriptFileName - script file name. The file extension is used to determine the script engine and therefore must conform to standard extension usage
        tableInformation - array of table information
        groupNames - list containing the names of any groups referenced in the script association
        linkHandler - link handler reference
        groupHandler - group handler reference
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        Reference to the script engine; null if an error occurs
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while attempting to access the script file

      • executeScript

        private void executeScript(java.lang.String scriptFileName,
                           CcddClassesDataTable.TableInformation[] tableInformation,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> groupNames,
                           CcddLinkHandler linkHandler,
                           CcddGroupHandler groupHandler,
                           java.awt.Component parent)
                    throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Execute a script
        Parameters:
        scriptFileName - script file name. The file extension is used to determine the script engine and therefore must conform to standard extension usage
        tableInformation - array of table information
        groupNames - list containing the names of any groups referenced in the script association
        linkHandler - link handler reference
        groupHandler - group handler reference
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while attempting to access the script file

      • readTable

        private CcddClassesDataTable.TableInformation readTable(java.lang.String tablePath,
                                                        java.awt.Component parent)
        Recursive method to load a table, and all the tables referenced within it and its child tables. The data is combined into a single array
        Parameters:
        tablePath - table path
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        A reference to the TableInformation for the parent table; null if the table has already been loaded. The error flag for the table data handler is set if an error occurred loading the data
